item.text: How much  difficulty do you have in managing basic daily activities such as moving around, brushing your hair, getting dressed, and using the bathroom?
How much  difficulty do you have in managing advanced daily activities such as cleaning, shopping, and cooking?
How much  difficulty do you have in managing work or school activities?
How much  difficulty do you have in managing hobbies, leisure, and community activities?
How much difficulty do you have in managing your own needs?
How much difficulty do you have in managing your immediate family's needs?
How much difficulty do you have in managing the needs of your extended family, friends, and co-workers?
How much difficulty do you have in managing community needs?
